definition: to obtain by impersonation/to falsely claim as one's own
to emit/to give off/to send out (or up, forth)/to brave/to face/reckless/to falsely adopt (sb's identity etc)/to feign/(literary) to cover
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: Somebody has falsely claimed the watch.
Police are now investigating the family on possible fraud charges.
sentences.chinese: 警方目前調查其家人可能有冒領養老金的行爲。

sentences.english: or clothes, Tyler goes to gyms and hotels and claims clothing out of the lost and found.
sentences.chinese: 他去體育館和賓館的失物招領處冒領衣服。

sentences.english: The impersonator to rely on financial aid for Greece worse.
sentences.chinese: 這些冒領讓依賴救援的希臘財政雪上加霜。
